author: Special Correspondent
M Soundariya Preetha
text:
Power supply to the following areas coming under Kuppepalayam, Neelambur, Thekkalur, Earipalayam, Kaniyur and Vanjipalayam sub-stations in Coimbatore will be disrupted on March 31 from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Sengalipalayam, Kuppepalayam, Puthur, Kurumbapalayam, Vadavalli, Vadugapalayam, Mondikalipudur, Rangappagoundanpudur, Moonukattiyur, Onnipalayam, Karichipalayam, Neelambur, Muthalipalayam, Seriyampalayam, Vellanappatty, foundry association, Vadugapalayam, Chennaiandavar Koil, Vinoba Nagar, Viralikadu, Thanneerpandal, Kittampalayam, Brindhavannagar, Rayarpalayam, Sengalipalayam, Kulathupalayam, Valayapalayam, Thekkalur, Thumminiampalayam, Pudhupalayam, Alampalayam, Vellandipalayam, Senangadu, Savakkatupalayam, Thandukaranpalayam, Cheyur, Vadugapalayam, Kamanayakanpalayam, Semmandapalayam, Semandapalayampudur, Kothapalayam and Murugampalayam.

Power supply to areas coming under Vanjipalayam sub-station in Tirupur will be disrupted on March 31 between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m.
title: TAMIL NADU
